main.proffession: and I'm a front end developer

responsive.title: Responsive
responsive.textUpper: My layout looks good on all devices.
responsive.textLower: It responds to different screen sizes; from 320px(small devices) to 1920px(widescreen monitors).

fast.title: Fast
fast.textUpper: Fast load times is my highest priority.
fast.textLower: I use different best practices for image optimization, minimization, compression, code splitting, etc.

browser.title: Cross-browser
browser.textUpper: Providing all of required features in your browser list.
browser.textLower: I take into account your browser support preferences (including Edge and IE11) using Post CSS, Babel and polyfills.

code.title: Code quality
code.textUpper: Scalable, structured, clean and well organized code.
code.textLower: This is one of my main goals in the process of development. For this purpose I use DRY Principle and best practices for writing super readable code

about.position: I am a Front-End Developer at
about.text: I have serious passion for creating web interfaces and their development. Details about my education or work experience you can find in my

astorun.title: Online shop
astorun.description:
Astorun it is a small online sports store created using Vue.js at Nuxt.js platform for server side rendering.

Designed for the instagram target audience, through which the promotion will be carried out

anycash.title: Online wallet
anycash.description:
Anycash - your own online wallet.

Created using Vue.js at Nuxt.js platform for server side rendering. Using the Any.cash service, you can make exchanges and cryptocurrency conversions. There is a bonus system and an affiliate program.

k2k.title: Fast credits and transfers
k2k.description:
K2K it is a project for instant online credits and transfers.

The site is created with pure js. Only jQuery was used from libraries.

express-finance.title: Instant credits online
express-finance.description:
Express Finance - online lending and transfer system. More details about the possibilities you can see in your account.

The site is created with pure js. Only jQuery was used from libraries.

gnc.title: Blockchain technology
gnc.description:
GNC it is a US-based Silicon Valley technology company; focused on building the next generation blockchain technology.

The site is created with pure js. Only jQuery was used from libraries.

mvc.title: TODO's mvc
mvc.description:
In my opinion, todo application is the best practical task for a beginner. This is where I begin the study of any framework. Ideal for short code review.

React todo

Source: https://github.com/BlackJeezuz/react-todo/tree/master/src
Demo: https://blackjeezuz.github.io/react-todo/

Vanilla todo

Source: https://github.com/BlackJeezuz/vanilla-todo
Demo: https://blackjeezuz.github.io/vanilla-todo/app/

Vue todo

Source: https://github.com/BlackJeezuz/vue-todo/src
Demo: https://blackjeezuz.github.io/vue-todo/
